KA.IUHCI.content: supreme task nature has set for mankind: freedom under external laws (Freiheit unter äußeren Gesetzen), a perfectly just civil constitution (eine vollkommen gerechte bürgerliche Verfassung) > the greatest want (Not) leads to laws [metaphor of trees]

KA.IUHCI.content: [Hegel-like] might this conviction in purpose only write a novel? [fiction in philosophy] > we are too short-sighted to perceive the secret mechanism of nature’s plan, a planless conglomeration of human activities could be used as a guide when presented as a SYSTEM > trace of this plan in ever art, culture, law
